New Records: Nicholas Pooran equalled India’s record set in 2007 by former all-rounder Yuvraj Singh with six sixes against England
Nicholas Pooran surpassed Chris Gayle (124 sixes) as West Indies’ most decorated T20I six-hitter
Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran scored a record-equalling 36 runs off Azmatullah Omarzai’s over in the T20 World Cup match between Afghanistan and West Indies
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies notched up the highest first-innings total in the ongoing event and their highest total in the T20 World Cups
